_source.short_desc: Easy multi-platform software to make any diagram. Intuitive tools and templates, with simple collaboration and sharing features.
_source.long_desc: Diagramming software that provides automatic formatting, hundreds of templates and simple diagram sharing. Create all types of diagrams, including: flowcharts & process maps, org charts, CAD & floor plans, project charts & schedules, network diagrams, wireframes & mockups, charts and so much more. SmartDraw runs on any internet connected device and includes a Windows PC download. Import, modify & export Visio. Full MS Office, Box & GSuite integrations. Easy file sharing and collaboration.
_source.pricing_details:
Single User: $9.95 per month, billed annually

Multiple Users (for 5+ users): $5.95 per month, billed annually
_source.target_audience: SmartDraw serves anyone who needs to make a diagram, from contractors and architects, to business executives and project managers. SmartDraw's tools will help any professional become more effective.

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Enterprise (For a Limited Time, Save Up to 55%, Sale Ends 12/3!) is an end-to-end construction software that can grow with your business. It provides all the tools your construction business needs, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage inventory, track sales, and even run payroll, but at the fraction of the cost. With QuickBooks Enterprise, you save thousands of dollars a year vs. comparable solutions. Take a free test drive today.

related_products.short_desc: Easily keep track of all your construction projects with ease in monday.com's simple desktop or app platform.
related_products.features: Manage your construction projects with monday.com from planning to execution, all in one software. Share files, comments, checklists, and more to stay up-to-date throughout every construction project's development. Use various views to monitor all your project aspects, from budgets to deliverables, and view your data however you see fit. Get updates from the field in real-time with our mobile app, and invite external stakeholders, designers, and agents to track your project's progress.

related_products.short_desc: Procore is a construction platform that manages your projects, resources, and financials from project planning to closeout.
related_products.features: Make it easier to manage construction projects with Procore. Take control of construction outcomes, minimize risk, and protect profits with a #1 rated construction management platform. Deliver projects on time and on budget by managing your entire project from the palm of your hand. Procore runs on any desktop, laptop, or mobile device that has access to a wifi connection.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet delivers increased project efficiency and accountability by streamlining communication and documentation.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet is the work execution platform that many of the world's largest construction companies rely on to stay productive, communicate among far-flung teams, and document every step of every project. Smartsheet delivers increased project efficiency and accountability by streamlining communication and documentation.

**Best Business App of 2014 - Evernote Platform Awards
**Gartner Cool Vendor 2015 - Project & Portfolio Management

related_products.short_desc: Connect the field to the office with digitized, integrated project management workflows.
related_products.features: Construction management software for field execution and project management that empowers you to seamlessly collaborate, and deliver construction projects on time, on budget.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a work management software with approvals, time tracking, Gantt charts, Kanban boards, budget management, reports, and more.
related_products.features: Wrike is an award-winning project management software that is trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Create a streamlined digital workplace using custom request forms, Kanban boards, Gantt charts, budget management, time tracking, real-time updates, and performance reports all in one place that can be shared company-wide. Integrate Wrike with 400+ applications to automate your everyday processes. Customize workflows and reduce the need for emails, meetings, status updates, and more.

related_products.short_desc: ClockShark is the leading mobile GPS time tracking & scheduling software for local construction, field service, and contractors.
related_products.features: ClockShark is the leading mobile GPS time tracking and scheduling software built for field service, contractors and construction businesses that want a simpler way to track employee time, run payroll quickly and accurately, and understand job costs. Over 8,000 customers have replaced the hassle of paper timesheets with software that makes it easier to run their business and keeps accountants happy. Don't take our word for it, start a free trial today!

related_products.short_desc: Buildertrend is the No. 1 construction project management software, trusted by homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors.
related_products.features: Buildertrend is the No. 1, cloud-based construction project management software for homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors. Since 2006, we have empowered the construction industry with a better way to build. More than 1 million users across the globe have chosen Buildertrend as their platform for real-time collaboration. Our software helps construction professionals complete projects while reducing delays, eliminating communication errors and increasing customer satisfaction.

related_products.short_desc: The leading construction management tool that keeps projects on track. Plan and schedule your team's best project work, from anywhere.
related_products.features: Float is a resource management platform used by teams big and small (from 5 to 5,000+). Manage your capacity on autopilot with direct calendar integrations, custom work hours, and public holidays. Plan projects with precision by adding phases and budgets. Assign tasks quickly with easy-to-use scheduling tools. Forecast budgets and resources with powerful reporting. Track your team's time to monitor project progress. Connect Asana, Jira, Slack, and more via direct integrations. Free 30-day trial.

related_products.short_desc: Keep your projects on schedule and on budget with real-time GPS insights. Cut costs, improve cycle time and get the job done safely.
related_products.features: See where your drivers, assets, materials, & equipment are & how they're being used, in real-time. Optimize the use of your vehicles & other assets to limit costly fuel consumption & wear-and-tear. Track equipment and prevent theft, view precise locations, improve cycle times, dispatch faster, prevent accidents, mitigate risk, assess driver behavior, monitor diagnostics & more.

related_products.short_desc: Construction asset management software for tracking and managing tools, materials, and assets across locations. Free 15 day trial!
related_products.features: Our leading construction asset management software enables you to track tools and equipment, schedule maintenance and scan RFID tags, Barcodes and QR-codes in bulk. We're a fully integrated asset management system, enabling you to draft POs, manage inventory, and create service tickets all in one go. Full location histories and actionable service reports help you deter theft and loss, making this the best asset management software around. Try us out for free with a 15 day trial!

similar_products.features: Quickbase is the construction management software that gets the right information to the right people at the right time. Construction companies use Quickbase to track construction projects, centralize data, and drive deeper insight and efficiency. Quickbase is an end-to-end solution with tools like CRM, Project Management, Service Requests, Employee Management, Order Management, and more. And you can build it all without coding a thing.

similar_products.short_desc: Asite's construction management software organizes all your project information on a single, secure, cloud-based platform.
similar_products.features: Asite's Construction Management Software simplifies construction management. By bringing all your project information together onto an organized, secure, cloud-base platform, you get instant visibility into your project status. Plus, the control and automation tools to keep your project moving. Asite is the only software that offers unlimited configurability with workflows, forms and reports-so you can work the way you need to.  Contractor-friendly pricing with unlimited users & storage

similar_products.short_desc: ProjectTeam.com is a top construction management solution for teams that want the flexibility of custom forms and interactive reports.
similar_products.features: ProjectTeam.com is construction project management software customized to your needs. In addition to standard forms such as RFIs, Submittals, Contracts, and Change Orders, you can easily add your own custom forms, workflows, reports, print templates, and more. With ProjectTeam.com, you aren't limited to what the system provides by default. You can extend ProjectTeam.com to track all of your unique project and organizational needs. You can also integrate with your other business-critical apps.

similar_products.short_desc: Assignar simplifies your scheduling, dispatch, timesheeting, data collection, and communication with your construction field employees.
similar_products.features: Assignar is a cloud-based platform that provides construction management for self-perform and subcontractors. Assignar connects key operational pillars - scheduling, time-tracking, field data collection, and reporting to help contractors run their business efficiently.

Use Revit? for every stage of a building project, from construction docs to ribbon cutting.
 Call (818) 639-7755 for more information.
similar_products.features:
Revit? BIM software helps builders, contractors, and doers stay on top of projects from start to finish. Main capabilities:
- Use data-rich 3D models to make planning and preconstruction decisions earlier. Align your construction modeling efforts for downstream uses.
- Use Revit models to coordinate onsite trades; detect clashes; sequence phases; and improve office-to-field efficiency, quality assurance, and quality control.
Call (818) 639-7755 for more information.

similar_products.short_desc: eSUB Cloud is the only field-focused project management platform built for specifically for subcontractors.
similar_products.features: Developed exclusively for commercial subcontractors, eSUB Cloud delivers a mobile and cloud-based construction project management platform. Create, store, access, and analyze all your data, documents, and activities from any device or location. eSUB Cloud's comprehensive platform includes applications for managing submittals, change orders, RFIs, daily reports, field notes, POs, correspondence, time cards and more, while also integrating with accounting, design and drawing management solutions.

similar_products.short_desc: InEight construction software is a cloud-based platform that helps manage risk and keeps capital projects on schedule and under budget.
similar_products.features: InEight construction software is a cloud-based project controls platform that manages every phase of the capital project life cycle. Developed by construction professionals, the software provides real-time information that helps enterprise-level owners, contractors and engineers minimize risk, control costs and improve operational efficiency. InEight software has delivered better outcomes on over 400 billion dollars' worth of capital projects around the world.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Architecture software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Architecture tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Architecture software is project management software designed for the architecture, construction, and engineering industries. Contractors, architects and engineers use these tools to develop and refine designs for new products, as well as manage current projects and job proposals. Architecture software is related to Construction Estimating software, Construction CRM software, and Construction Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Construction Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Construction Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Construction accounting software automates accounting, job costing and loan servicing functions for the construction, architecture, and engineering industries. Construction accounting software offer comprehensive management and reporting tools for construction breakdowns, budgets, expenditures, change orders, cost-over-runs and completion progress. Additionally, construction accounting provides standard monthly accounting available from your traditional construction accounting system. Accounting software is related to Construction Estimating software, Construction CRM software and Construction Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Construction CRM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Construction CRM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Construction CRM software encompasses Customer Relationship Management applications targeted specifically to the construction industry. It allows building professionals to not only store information about their clients and potential customers but also to track ongoing projects and sales efforts. Construction CRM software is related to Construction Management software, Construction Accounting software, Architectural Drafting software, Construction Estimating software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Construction Estimating software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Construction Estimating tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Construction estimating software enables contractors and builders to accurately estimate project costs. Construction cost estimation software is used by home builders, contractors, and architects to effectively manage construction budgets. Also, construction cost estimating software is common with interior and landscape designers to quickly and efficiently produce accurate and competitively-priced proposals to potential customers. Contractor estimating software also offers features such as job and sub-contractor scheduling, blueprint scanning and auto-updating materials pricing databases. Construction Estimating software is related to Construction Accounting software, Architectural Drafting software, Construction CRM software and Construction Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Home Builder software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Home Builder tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Home Builder software provides construction management solutions specialize for residential builders and contractors. Features typically include job costing, sales and inventory management, scheduling and hours tracking, and accounting tools. Home builders may also be interested in Construction Estimating software, Construction Accounting software, Architecture software, Construction Management software, and Construction CRM software.

_source.short_desc: Easy multi-platform software to make any diagram. Intuitive tools and templates, with simple collaboration and sharing features.
_source.long_desc: Make easy 2D landscape drawings and designs in minutes using SmartDraw's built in templates, tools and symbols. Includes pre-made designs, as well as the ability to start from scratch. Draw and print to any scale, including Metric. Simple sharing and collaboration tools. Import Visio files & stencils. Easily design landscapes, gardens, pools, floor plans and more.

Single User: $9.95 per month, billed annually

Multiple Users (for 5+ users): $5.95 per month, billed annually
_source.target_audience: SmartDraw serves anyone who needs to make a diagram, from contractors and architects, to business executives and project managers. SmartDraw's tools will help any professional become more effective.

category_features.definition: Establish and track key performance indicators that help evaluate progress and results

category_features.name: Milestone Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor task progress and planned accomplishments to better manage project status

category_features.name: Modeling & Simulation
category_features.definition: Graphing and outlining possibilities of different scenarios and performance, 'what if' anaysis, yield analysis, cash flow projections

category_features.name: Roadmapping
category_features.definition: Identifying desired outcomes and important milestones and creating a plan on how to achieve them

category_features.name: Scenario Planning
category_features.definition: Outline potential variations of future development and identify risks and opportunities within each

category_features.name: Scorecards
category_features.definition: Capture statistical records to measure achievements or progress towards  a particular goal.

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Design Templates
category_features.definition: Create designs using pre-built templates or customize them with flowcharts, mindmaps, wireframes, network diagrams and org charts

category_features.name: Drag & Drop Editor
category_features.definition: Drag and drop images, icons, widgets and prototypes from the desktop, apps or central library.

category_features.name: Wireframe Creation
category_features.definition: Create static wireframes representing basic skeletal structure of applications and websites to give an overview of design.

related_products.short_desc: 2D and 3D CAD software with design automation and industry-specific toolsets, plus web and mobile apps.
related_products.features: CAD software used for precise 2D and 3D drafting, design, and modeling with solids, surfaces, mesh objects, documentation features, and more. It includes features to automate tasks and increase productivity such as comparing drawings, counting, adding objects, and creating tables. It also comes with seven industry-specific toolsets for electrical design, plant design, architecture layout drawings, mechanical design, 3D mapping, adding scanned images, and converting raster images.

related_products.short_desc: Buildertrend is the No. 1 construction project management software, trusted by homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors.
related_products.features: Buildertrend is the No. 1, cloud-based construction project management software for homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors. Since 2006, we have empowered the construction industry with a better way to build. More than 1 million users across the globe have chosen Buildertrend as their platform for real-time collaboration. Our software helps construction professionals complete projects while reducing delays, eliminating communication errors and increasing customer satisfaction.

related_products.short_desc: Flexible, Fast & Accurate Estimating for Landscaping Contractors. Bid & Win more work with STACK! Create Your Free Account Today!
related_products.features:
Flexible, Fast and Accurate Estimating for Landscaping Contractors. 

Bid & Win More Profitable Work in Less Time with STACK! 

STACK empowers your team to quickly and accurately measure digital plans, quantify materials and collaborate with key project stakeholders. Our easy-to-use, cloud-based software will help you to ensure takeoff accuracy, eliminate costly bid errors and win more profitable work. 

Create Your Free Account Today!

related_products.short_desc: The fastest, easiest, and highest value landscape business software to automate everything from first customer contact to getting paid.
related_products.features: mHelpDesk is the #1 easiest and most powerful solution for your landscaping business, automating everything from first customer contact all the way to getting paid. We provide our customers with mobile and online tools that are unmatched in performance, reliability, and functionality. We've packed the best tools into one extremely easy-to-use and affordable package that requires no big upfront investment. And we have in-house product experts to get you up and running immediately.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your landscape crew more efficiently. Take control of your schedules, invoices and quotes by moving them to the cloud.
related_products.features: Verizon Connect Work helps you manage your landscape crew more efficiently. Our solution allows you to take control of your schedules, invoices, and quotes by moving them to the cloud. Collect relevant information such as site details, photos, and customer signatures while empowering your technicians with software that's compatible with their smartphones and tablets. Jobs can be customized to match the needs of each work order and added, updated reassigned, and synced with your back-office.

related_products.short_desc: Jobber helps your landscape business stay on top of jobs and deliver great customer experiences. Automation & scheduling in one place!
related_products.features: Keep your landscape jobs on track and your customers happy with Jobber. Our field management software allows you to schedule jobs more efficiently, optimize routes, and send quotes and invoices by text. You can track a job from start to finish no matter where your team goes! With a mobile app, free training, and easy installation, Jobber saves you time while you create 5-star customer service experiences. Try it now for FREE!

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by +850,000 pros as the all-in-one construction management software designed to help finish jobs on time and under budget.
related_products.features: ConstructionOnline is trusted by +850,000 pros as the all-in-one construction management software designed to help finish jobs on time and under budget. Increase profits with integrated estimating & takeoff, change order tracking, and client selections. Avoid delays with Gantt chart scheduling and centralized communication. Real-time dashboards help you and your team make informed decisions and keep projects on track and on target. Get your demo and see how to build better, faster & smarter.

related_products.short_desc: User-Friendly Field Service Software. Manage Leads, Estimates, Jobs, Customers, Invoices & More!

We are also one of the most proven platforms available to simplify and manage your service business. Trusted by 1000s of service businesses for over 20 years. Plans starting as low as $39/month.

related_products.short_desc: DynaScape specializes in design software and business management solutions for the professional landscape industry.
related_products.features:
DynaScape specializes in design software and business management solutions for the professional landscape industry.

Quickly produce extraordinary designs with our CAD-based software, export to DynaScape Color to bring your drawings to life with full color-rendering, or take your designs to the next level with Sketch3D, our comprehensive library of 3D components.

Manage360 enables you to track every aspect of your operations from initial quote to final invoice.

related_products.short_desc: Book more jobs, get paid faster, & manage your entire business from your pocket with vcita's all-in-1 app for landscapers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Construction Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Construction Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Construction management and construction project management software coordinates business processes for contractors and builders. Organizations use construction management systems to enable collaborative workflow and data access, integrating multiple teams and office locations into a shared work environment. These building software solutions also provide scheduling and real time completion data, including: monitoring of product status, start and finish dates, budgets and expenditures. They also typically offer tools for data organization and presentation, such as construction templates. Construction Management software is related to Construction Accounting software, Architectural Drafting software, Construction CRM software and Construction Estimating software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Field Service Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Field Service Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Field Service Management software enables organizations to manage resources and communicate with field employees. Field Service Management systems enhance productivity by allowing constant contact between dispatch office and offsite personnel. They improve the customer experience by giving field personnel access to service histories, mapping services, scheduling tools and to the organization's knowledge base resources. Field Service Management software is related to Maintenance Management software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Garden Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Garden Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Garden Center software helps run operations of retail and wholesale plant nurseries and greenhouse growers. It includes point of sale solutions, inventory management systems and order tracking and fulfillment applications. Garden Center software is related to Point of Sale software, Florist software, Retail Management Systems and Farm Management software.
